meanings.definition: The action of subjecting newcomers to abusive or humiliating tricks and ridicule.
meanings.sent1: Hazing can be harmful to new students.
meanings.sent2: The college banned hazing to protect incoming students.
meanings.sent3: The comedy skit about hazing at the school talent show had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: The dark cloud of hazing loomed over the freshmen's orientation week.
meanings.sent5: The news report shed light on the dangers of hazing in schools.
